alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 26 at 3:38AM MST until March 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches, except 20 to 30 inches in the Ogden Valley. * WHERE...Wasatch Back. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult on area roadways. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes Monday through Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected Sunday evening through Monday morning and Monday night into Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
